text: He is right on many things but not this one. However I do see his points regarding green investment and ROI it has to be managed more systematically which has been a failure in the past with so many investments creating more problems than good due to lack of regulation, support, data monitoring/reporting (TCFD, IFRS1,2) but on the bright side it can be beneficial if done right several case studies show tremendous saves in renewable investment (refer to studies from various sectors around the world, healthcare, manufacturing‚Ä¶etc) The fact on China not using wind is wrong, China uses the most wind power 65.5% installations globally (IRENA 2023). This has given them and edge in manufacturing and something that America can only temporarily achieve with fossil fuel production, long term it is not sustainable both for planet and costs.
